title: Migration to Apache Airflow for Workflow Orchestration
description: Led the migration from a custom middleware to Apache Airflow, resolving performance bottlenecks, optimizing workflows, and enhancing system reliability and scalability.

title: B2B Portal Redesign & Functionality Integration
description: Led the redesign of a B2B portal's landing page, integrating essential functionalities like invoice and delivery notes viewing, robust analytics, and a headless CMS, significantly enhancing user experience and operational efficiency.

title: DanteGPT: Fine-tuned GPT-2 for Dantesque Text Generation
description: Developed and fine-tuned 'DanteGPT,' a GPT-2 model designed to generate text in the poetic style of Dante Alighieriâ€™s Divina Commedia. This project, available on Hugging Face and Kaggle, emulates Dante's tercet structure, rhyme scheme (ABA BCB CDC), and thematic elements.

title: Data Warehouse Modernization: Oracle to PostgreSQL Migration & Orchestration
description: Led the migration and modernization of a data warehouse from Oracle to PostgreSQL, including improved ETL orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure enhancements, achieving a 100% cost reduction and 20% performance boost.

title: AI-Powered Customer Support Chatbot
description: Engineered an intelligent, end-to-end AI chatbot solution that provides instant, accurate answers from diverse company documentation, significantly boosting customer satisfaction and reducing support costs.

title: AI-Powered Personal Data Detection for GDPR Compliance
description: Developed and implemented a BERT-based NLP model to automatically detect personal data in order notes, achieving 85% increased accuracy and reducing manual review time by 90%, significantly strengthening GDPR compliance

title: Gentleman Closet: AI-Powered Smart Wardrobe Assistant
description: Developed 'Gentleman Closet,' a modern and intelligent personal wardrobe management mobile application built with Flutter. It helps users organize clothes, plan outfits, and receive AI-based suggestions tailored to style, weather, and occasion, featuring an offline-first design and planned LLM integration.

title: AI for Histopathologic Cancer Detection
description: Developed a deep learning CNN model for binary classification of metastatic tissue in histopathologic scans, enhancing potential for automated pre-screening in pathology.

title: AI for Italian Misogyny Detection
description: Fine-tuned BERT model for accurate detection of misogynistic content in Italian text, trained and evaluated on the AMI dataset.

title: Logistics Cost Control Dashboard with Anomaly Detection
description: Developed a dashboard to process courier invoices, cross-reference with shipment data, and detect anomalies, providing actionable insights for logistics cost optimization and accurate billing.

title: AI-Powered Prioritization System for B2B Platform
description: Integrated a machine learning algorithm into a B2B platform to automate and optimize the prioritization of tasks and customer requests, enhancing operational efficiency and processing times.

title: Platform Integrations for Veterinary Customer Journey & B2B
description: Led the integration of HubSpot and BigCommerce with company systems to automate processes, synchronize data, and enhance the B2B experience for veterinary clients.
